job_tasks.phrase: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to designing and managing data architectures, which is a core component of data engineering for AI/ML.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts
job_tasks.justification: This task specifically involves working with LLMs and evaluating their prompts, which falls under prompt engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating classification algorithms is a task related to model development and assessment, fitting into traditional ML model work.

job_tasks.phrase: design how we store and manually annotate data
job_tasks.justification: This describes the management and preparation of data, including annotation, which is crucial for AI/ML model training and evaluation.

job_tasks.phrase: automating the data and ml processes used within the team to improve solutions like Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR (Voicebot) and LLM-based Advisor Assist.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the automation of processes to improve existing AI solutions, which involves integration and development of the underlying systems.

job_tasks.phrase: maintain and innovate on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling.
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and innovating on existing tools and platforms is a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: migration from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot
job_tasks.justification: This involves the integration and migration of AI platforms, which is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: empower our solutions with LLMs in a manner that is responsible, secure and reliable
job_tasks.justification: Integrating LLMs into solutions and ensuring their reliability and security falls under software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team of data scientists, engineers and consultants.
soft_skills.justification: Being part of a multidisciplinary scrum team implies collaboration and communication with various roles.

soft_skills.phrase: In the extended team (~50 colleagues) you will be working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers.
soft_skills.justification: Working alongside diverse roles in an extended team highlights the need for communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: We want to make sure that these conversations are getting resolved in an effective and friction free manner.
soft_skills.justification: The desire to improve and resolve issues effectively implies a continuous learning and adaptation mindset to achieve better outcomes.

soft_skills.phrase: maintain and innovate on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling.
soft_skills.justification: The term 'innovate' suggests a drive for new solutions and taking ownership of improving existing tools.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a role that involves both core software engineering tasks (automating processes, maintaining and innovating tooling, migrating platforms, integrating LLMs) and specific GenAI tasks (evaluating LLM prompts, working with LLMs, migrating to MS Copilot). While there are also mentions of traditional ML (classification algorithms) and data engineering (medallion architecture, data storage/annotation), the emphasis on LLMs and conversational AI, coupled with the software engineering aspects of integration and maintenance, points towards a 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile. The role is not purely a specialist in GenAI model development but rather in building and maintaining systems that leverage GenAI.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad provides a good overview of the responsibilities and the team structure. It clearly mentions LLMs and related tasks, as well as software engineering aspects. However, it could be more specific about the exact technologies used (beyond LLM and MS Copilot) and the depth of involvement in model development versus integration. The mention of 'classification algorithms' alongside LLM tasks suggests a blend, but the overall focus leans towards GenAI integration and maintenance.
